testsuite.name: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And There exists a class called "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And There exists a unit called "Unit 1" for class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And There exists a unit called "Unit 2" for class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "As1" in unit "Unit 1" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "As2" in unit "Unit 1" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "Ex1" in unit "Unit 2" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "Ex2" in unit "Unit 2" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: Given I change the assignment "As1" in the unit "Unit 1" part of the "TimelineClass" class to start "today" and end "tomorrow"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "TimelineClass" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And I go to the Edit Class Schedule page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And I see a timeline is rendered
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: When I select the following modules "As1" on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And I move the selected modules "forward" one day on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And I move the selected modules "forward" one day on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And I move the selected modules "backward" one day on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And I click the undo button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: And I move the selected modules "forward" one day on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: Then I see the redo button is disabled on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Class schedule unable to redo action in previous sequence of actions
